segments.text: They are professors and government officials .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most of them are from America and Europe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are they doing in Beijing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are attending an international conference here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which hotel are they staying at ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are staying at the Hilton Hotel .
segments.speaker: S1
